Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Click on Username field; 3. Type username text
Expected_Result: Username field accepts and displays typed text; Cursor is active in field

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Click on Password field; 3. Type password text
Expected_Result: Password is masked with dots/asterisks; Characters are not visible

Test_Title: Verify Login button is clickable and functional
Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter valid credentials; 3. Verify Login button is enabled; 4. Click Login button
Expected_Result: Login button is clickable; Button has hover effect; Form is submitted on click

Test_Title: Verify Forgot Password link is accessible

Expected_Result: Link is visible and clickable; User is redirected to password reset page

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Observe the logo area

Expected_Result: LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube icons are visible and clickable

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Check footer area
Expected_Result: Copyright text 'Â© 2005 - 2026 OrangeHRM, Inc. All rights reserved.' is displayed

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter invalid username; 3. Enter valid password; 4. Click Login button
Expected_Result: Error message: Invalid credentials; User remains on login page; No session created

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter valid username; 3. Enter incorrect password; 4. Click Login button
Expected_Result: Error message: Invalid credentials; User remains on login page

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter invalid username; 3. Enter invalid password; 4. Click Login button
Expected_Result: Error message: Invalid credentials; Generic error (no user enumeration)

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Leave username field empty; 3. Enter password; 4. Click Login button
Expected_Result: Validation error: Required; Form submission prevented

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter username; 3. Leave password field empty; 4. Click Login button
Expected_Result: Validation error: Required; Form submission prevented

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Leave both fields empty; 3. Click Login button
Expected_Result: Validation errors shown for both fields; Form not submitted

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter disabled account credentials; 3. Click Login button
Expected_Result: Error message indicating account is disabled; Login prevented

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter single character username; 3. Enter valid password; 4. Click Login
Expected_Result: System handles minimum length input appropriately

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter 256+ character username; 3. Enter password; 4. Click Login
Expected_Result: System handles or truncates long input; No system error

Test_Title: Login with username containing only whitespace
Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter only spaces in username; 3. Enter password; 4. Click Login
Expected_Result: Validation error or trimmed to empty; Login fails gracefully

Test_Title: Login with username having leading/trailing spaces
Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter username with spaces; 3. Enter password; 4. Click Login
Expected_Result: Spaces are trimmed or error is shown; Consistent behavior

Test_Title: Login with special characters in password
Precondition: Account with special char password exists
Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter username; 3. Enter password with special characters; 4. Click Login
Expected_Result: Special characters are accepted; Login succeeds if valid

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter SQL injection payload in username; 3. Enter any password; 4. Click Login
Expected_Result: Input is rejected or sanitized; No database error; Login fails

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter valid username; 3. Enter SQL injection in password; 4. Click Login
Expected_Result: Input is sanitized; No SQL error; Login fails gracefully

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter XSS payload in username; 3. Enter password; 4. Observe response
Expected_Result: Script is not executed; Input is sanitized; No XSS vulnerability

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter username; 3. Enter XSS payload in password; 4. Submit
Expected_Result: Script is not executed; Input sanitized

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page; 2. Enter valid username; 3. Enter wrong password; 4. Repeat 10+ times rapidly

Steps: 1. Login successfully; 2. Check browser cookies; 3. Verify session token; 4. Check session timeout settings

Precondition: User is logged in and has Leave access

Expected_Result: Search executes; Results displayed with record count; Leave records shown

Steps: 1. Navigate to Leave List; 2. Select Leave Type from dropdown; 3. Click Search
Expected_Result: Only selected leave type records are displayed

Expected_Result: Autocomplete suggestions appear; Selection populates field; Search returns employee's leaves

Steps: 1. Navigate to Leave List; 2. Select Sub Unit from dropdown; 3. Click Search
Expected_Result: Only leaves from selected sub unit are displayed
